title: Neural Network Predicts Ion Concentration Profiles under Nanoconfinement. (arXiv:2304.04896v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Modeling the ion concentration profile in nanochannel plays an important role in understanding the electrical double layer and electroosmotic flow. Due to the non-negligible surface interaction and the effect of discrete solvent molecules, molecular dynamics (MD) simulation is often used as an essential tool to study the behavior of ions under nanoconfinement. Despite the accuracy of MD simulation in modeling nanoconfinement systems, it is computationally expensive. In this work, we propose neural network to predict ion concentration profiles in nanochannels with different configurations, including channel widths, ion molarity, and ion types. By modeling the ion concentration profile as a probability distribution, our neural network can serve as a much faster surrogate model for MD simulation with high accuracy. We further demonstrate the superior prediction accuracy of neural network over XGBoost. Lastly, we demonstrated that neural network is flexible in predicting ion concentration

translated_title: 神经网络预测纳米限制下离子浓度分布
translated_abstract: 纳米通道中的离子浓度分布模拟在理解电双层和电渗流中扮演重要角色。分子动力学模拟由于表面相互作用和离散溶剂分子效应，经常被用作研究在纳米限制下离子的行为的重要工具，然而计算开销很大。本文提出了用神经网络预测纳米通道中不同构型（包括通道宽度，离子浓度和离子种类等）中离子浓度分布。通过将离子浓度分布建模为概率分布，我们的方法可以作为模拟逼真的MD模拟的快速替代模型。我们进一步展示了神经网络相对于XGBoost的优越预测准确性。最后，我们还展示了神经网络在不同精度下预测离子浓度分布的灵活性。
tldr: 本论文提出了用神经网络预测纳米通道中离子浓度分布的方法，可以作为MD模拟的快速替代模型，比XGBoost有更高的准确性并且具有灵活性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a neural network method to predict ion concentration distribution in nanochannels, which can serve as a fast surrogate model for MD simulation with higher accuracy than XGBoost and flexibility in predicting ion concentration profiles with different discretization accuracy.
